rooms.description: Small entrance hall with reception area and coat closet. Designed to provide a welcoming Vastu compliant entry.
Large open living space integrating the dining area and home office. Features exposed concrete elements in line with Brutalist aesthetics and Vastu orientation for energy flow.
Formal dining space adjacent to the living area. Windows on the east side aligning with Vastu principles for sunlight and positive energy.
Dedicated home office space near a window for natural light. Designed with minimalistic Brutalist features and optimized for productivity per Vastu guidelines.
Functional kitchen integrated into the dining area, featuring a compact layout and Vastu-compliant north-facing windows for light and ventilation.
Spacious master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom on the south side to promote restful energy according to Vastu principles. Includes built-in storage and minimalist design.
Additional bedroom for privacy and comfort, positioned in the west wing with natural light from east-facing windows as per Vastu guidelines.
Primary bathroom adjacent to master bedroom; designed with a functional layout and adequate ventilation. Uses water features in accordance with Vastu to balance energies.
